WorkItem.Description:
Hi Roman

Great tool.  I'm reporting a small bug here.  The problem is in scanner.cs with the while loop on line 87.  If you use the Expression Grammar and enter the expression:

1 + !

Scanner gets stuck in the loop because the invalid exclamation mark is not found.  Extending the while condition to test _source.EOF() as well fixes the issue.

Bill Seddon
